"Design a stapler that can staple up to 100 pages at once, making it perfect for those who need to staple large documents quickly."
"Create a stapler that can staple different types of paper, including thick or thin materials, without jamming."
"Develop a stapler that can staple documents vertically, allowing users to staple documents in portrait mode."
"Innovate on the traditional stapler design by creating a stapler that has a built-in scanner and printer, allowing users to print out and staple their documents in one step."
"Create a stapler that can staple documents with different colors of staples, allowing users to add a personal touch to their documents."
